abstract.t: This document describes the Thin variant of the Datagram CongestionControl Protocol (DCCP) Congestion Control Identifier 3, TCP-Friendly Rate Control (TFRC). The Thin variant is more restrictedthan CCID 3; it limits allowable options, acceptable feature values,and so forth. CCID 3-Thin packets are still valid DCCP CCID 3packets. CCID 3-Thin was designed for small clients where a fullDCCP implementation would be too expensive.
